name: Stories About Firewater and Ghosts: El Tunjo
name_original: Stories About Firewater and Ghosts: El Tunjo
description: This game takes the characters from the Francisco “The Man” and expands their story into a world where other legends from the folklore come to life as well. He will be trying to recover El Tunjo from The Devil, a golden baby that grants wish on exchange for food and care. He will be going through different Colombian themed locations according through the legend and will be helped with powers from “God” as he faces all kinds of horrors.
